entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming north 20 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
